altername_name: Ma Qiao E Mo Ta: Devilish Mahjong Tower
name: Ma Qiao E Mo Ta: Devilish Mahjong Tower
overview: Ma Qiao E Mo Ta: Devilish Mahjong Tower (麻将恶魔塔) is an unlicensed mahjong game for the Sega Mega Drive by C&E Inc. released in Taiwan in 1994. This game is not pornographic like other unlicensed mahjong games, but rather has a horror theme and a story campaign battling increasingly difficult monsters (you can also choose to play a single match with one of the monsters in the "V.S.MODE"). 14-tile and 17-tile modes are available.
